price: Allaha və Onun Elçisinə itaət edənlər, Allahdan qorxub çəkinənlər – məhz onlar uğur qazananlardır.
arabic: وَمَن يُطِعِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ وَيَخۡشَ ٱللَّهَ وَيَتَّقۡهِ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡفَآئِزُونَ

version.title: Azerbaijani translation - Ali Khan Mosaiv
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Azerbaijani by Khan Mosaiv. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waman yuṭiʿi al-laha warasūlahu wayakhsha al-laha wayattaqhi fa-ulāika humu al-fāizūna
